title: Collaborative Learning Design Utilizing Remote Education Library Services

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Focuses on how preservice teachers can design and implement collaborative learning projects utilizing library services in remote education environments

learning_goals: Students can systematically collect and analyze learning materials using a remote education library service platform (digital resource search, online reference services, etc.)
They can collaboratively design and implement project-based learning (PBL) tasks with peer teachers and students.
They can evaluate and improve strategies for utilizing digital library resources to promote learner engagement in remote education environments.

resources: Video Conferencing Tools (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
